text: For the purposes of this subchapter:

sections.text: Domestic sewage with storm and surface water limited;
Water supply after it has been used.
The term "stormwater sewage" means liquid flowing in sewers resulting directly from precipitation.
The term "combined sewage" means sewage containing both sanitary sewage and stormwater sewage.
The term "sewer" means a pipe or conduit carrying sewage.
The term "sanitary sewer" means a sewer which carries sanitary sewage.
The term "stormwater sewer" means a sewer which carries stormwater sewage.
The term "combined sewer" means a sewer which carries both sanitary sewage and stormwater sewage.
The term "sanitary sewage works" means a system of sanitary and combined sewers, appurtenances, pumping stations, and treatment works for conveying, treating, and disposing of sanitary sewage.
The term "stormwater sewer system" means a system of sewers, appurtenances, and pumping stations for conveying and disposing of stormwater sewage.
The term "combined sewer system" means a system of sewers and appurtenances conveying both sanitary sewage and stormwater sewage.
